page.title: 06Community Questionaire
page.content: This questionaire for our block was carried out by 87 children's families. NB.not all questions were answered. {No. of adults in household 146 {No. of children 220 {No. born in 7 mile radius 170 {No. born outside 7m. rad. 175 {No. of grandparents born in { 7m. rad. 25 {No. of adults employed 117 {No. doing agricultural work 35 { {EMPLOYED Boughton 29 { Faversham 21 {Canterbury 32 { Sittingbourne 4 { Elsewhere 35 {SHOPPING Local 14 { Elsewhere 65 {BUS SERVICE users:frequently 18 { sometimes 44 { never 12}
